jobs.title: Software Developer II
jobs.description: GIS-related software design and development of mobile-first responsive web applications, desktop applications, geoprocessing services, and backend services. This software is developed using Python, AngularJS, C#, ASP.NET Razor MVC, jQuery, and Bootstrap.

jobs.title: Senior Programmer Analyst
jobs.description: I wrote and maintained custom line of business applications for HIT clients' patient accounting systems, which imported ANSI standard 277CA and 835 transactions. I pro-actively updated older applications to newer, more efficient specifications. I used ad hoc TSQL queries and various tools at my disposal to resolve balancing issues on Electronic Remittance Advices (ERAs). I took the lead on special projects.
